preview: Pi-DE infinite scroll client with history prepending
Starting task-4 (Pi-DE infinite scroll client) — implementing fetchHistory() in RemoteAgent, loading state in useAgent, scroll detection in App.tsx, and loading indicator styles

feat(pi-de): infinite scroll with history prepending

- Add FetchHistoryRequest and HistoryPageResponse types to hyper-pi-protocol
- Implement RemoteAgent.fetchHistory() to send JSON requests over WebSocket
- Handle history_page responses: prepend messages, update pagination state
- Track hasMore and oldestIndex for pagination cursor
- Add onHistoryPage callback for state updates
- Implement useAgent hooks: isLoadingHistory, hasMoreHistory, loadOlderMessages
- Initialize oldestIndex from init_state totalMessages
- Add scroll listener to detect scroll-to-top and trigger fetchHistory
- Implement scroll position restoration via scrollHeight delta
- Add .loading-history CSS with animated spinner
- Comprehensive tests: RemoteAgent (24 tests), useAgent (8 tests)
- All 94 tests passing
